_header: The meed/meadow is fled the grace is gone
Bibliographic Ghosts: San Marino, CA, Henry Huntington Library EL 26.A.13 [olim Bridgewater]: probably error for 5411.

BLHar682.First Lines:
THe mede is flowe the grace is goonThe hert is chaungid from his
                    place…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Where y had wende hem be he nasThus myrthe and y are comen
                    foon
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
